You make it possible, Colorado

The Colorado Lottery gives back millions of dollars every year to parks, trails, pools, open space, and schools across our state. Those are all places where Coloradans love to get away and play. Lottery dollars support projects large and small in every county in the state. Check out the Lottery-funded projects in your region.
